00003 #ifndef BOOL_ELEMENT_H
00004 #define BOOL_ELEMENT_H
00005 
00006 #include <bitset>
00007 #include "InstructionElement.h"
00008 
00009 #define BIT_MASK_MAX_SIZE 64
00010 
00011 /*
00012         Design Pattern Used: Composite
00013         Class: BoolElement
00014         Parent: InstructionElement
00015         One of the Leaf(s) in the Composite Structure.
00016         Processes Bool type elements
00017 */
00018 
00019 
00020 
00021 namespace BabelShark
00022 {
00023         class BoolElement: public InstructionElement
00024         {
00025                 public:
00026                         BoolElement(unsigned int size, char* name);
00027                         ~BoolElement();
00028 
00029                         //used to read in data from packet
00030                         void Interpret(char* buffer);
00031 
00032                         //used to Display data to the WireShark output
00033                         char* Display();
00034 
00035                         std::bitset<BIT_MASK_MAX_SIZE> GetBitMask(){ return _BitMask;}
00036                 private:
00037 
00038             // members
00039             std::bitset<BIT_MASK_MAX_SIZE> _BitMask;
00040         };
00041 }
00042 
00043 
00044 #endif //BOOL_ELEMENT_H
